exam_info.exam_title: Designing and Implementing a Microsoft Azure AI Solution

official_objectives.title: Skills at a glance
official_objectives.content: Plan and manage an Azure AI solution (2025) Implement generative AI solutions (1520) Implement an agentic solution (510) Implement computer vision solutions (1015) Implement natural language processing solutions (1520) Implement knowledge mining and information extraction solutions (1520)
